<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King, a proclamation for prohibiting the exportation of iron ordnance and all great guns England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 broadside.
Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb and Henry Hills ..., London : 1681.
"Given at our court at Whitehall this ninth day of November 1681, and in the three and thirtieth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
=======

"Given at our court at Whitehall this ninth day of November 1681, and in the three and thirtieth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
